description.value:
Heavy drops of rain batter down, hitting like sling stones and impeding vision. Each creature in a @Template[type:burst|distance:15] within 120 feet takes @Damage[(floor((@actor.level -6)/2)+3)d8[bludgeoning]||traits:area-damage] damage with a @Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.kineticist.dc)|basic:true] save against your class DC. Until the start of your next turn, all creatures are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Concealed] while in the area, and all creatures outside the area are concealed to creatures within it.

Level (+2) The damage increases by 1d8.
